exercise.text:
28

Janusz Sorry I'm late. I was at the presentation on branding.

Carlos Wasn't that last week?

Janusz No, it was this morning at the Century Hotel.

Carlos Oh. Was it interesting?

Janusz Yes, it was, and there were lots of good questions at the end. The breakfast was good too! Anyway, why weren't you in the office yesterday?

Carlos There were terrible problems with flights from Rome, so I ...
